mapper.select: SELECT t.tic_code, t.tic_price, o.o_code, o.o_date, o.o_time, o.o_option, gw.gwon_code, gw.gwon_count, gw.gwon_name, gw.gwon_sale,NVL2((100-gw.gwon_sale)/100*tic_price,(100-gw.gwon_sale)/100*tic_price,tic_price) as gwon_pay FROM ticket t LEFT JOIN opt o ON t.tic_code = o.tic_code LEFT JOIN gwon gw ON gw.o_code = o.o_code WHERE t.tic_code = #{tic_code} AND o.o_code IN( SELECT distinct o.o_code FROM ticket t LEFT JOIN opt o ON t.tic_code = o.tic_code LEFT JOIN gwon gw ON gw.o_code = o.o_code WHERE TO_CHAR (o.o_date,'YYYYMMDD') = #{o_date} AND o.o_time = #{o_time})
